message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted and tailored to meet your specific needs, valued at $12000 to you. I am offering it to you at a special price of $9500, which I believe is an excellent opportunity to secure such a high-quality product at a reasonable cost. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations and if you would like to proceed with the purchase.
